Package com.eventmaster.backend.controller

Class OrganizerController

java.lang.Object
com.eventmaster.backend.controller.OrganizerController
@RestController @CrossOrigin @RequestMapping("/organizer") public class OrganizerController extends Object
A class which handles the HTTP-requests for organizer functions.
Author:
Fabian Unger

    • createEvent

      @PostMapping("/event/create") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> createEvent(@RequestBody Event event, @RequestParam String userMail)
      Endpoint to create an event.
      Parameters:
      event - Event which will be saved in the database.
      userMail - Mail of user who created event and becomes organizer.
      Returns:
      String about success or failure.

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      String about success or failure.

      Endpoint to create a series of events.
      Parameters:
      eventSeries - EventSeries with information about time interval between events.
      lastEvent - Last event of the event series with event data.
      Returns:
      String about success or failure.

      Endpoint to change a series of events.
      Parameters:
      eventSeries - New EventSeries with information about time interval between events.
      lastEvent - New last event of the series.
      Returns:
      String about success or failure.

      Parameters:
      eventSeriesId - ID of the EventSeries containing the events.

      Returns:
      String about success or failure.

      organisationId - ID of the organisation which contains the presets.

      Parameters:
      orgaId - ID of the organisation which will contain the preset.

      String about success or failure.

      Endpoint to invite a user to an organisation.
